articles.title: Atos moving towards $10 billion takeover of DXC - IT PRO
articles.description: French IT consultancy group hopes to expand its presence in the US market
articles.content:
Atos is gearing up to acquire US-based IT services provider DXC Technology.
The French IT consulting group is said to have approached DXC with a deal worth over $10 billion (£7.37bn), according to R… [+2733 chars]
